articles.title: WHO urges urgent measles vaccination for children amidst global outbreak surge - Firstpost
articles.description: WHO experts also backed new ways of using existing vaccines to tackle other disease outbreaks, including the use of the mpox vaccine made by Bavarian Nordic (BAVA.CO) for at-risk children in African countries.
